error.invalid_auth: Invalid authentication. Please check your username and password, and ensure Remote Management is enabled in router settings.

user.description:
Enter the connection details for your Cudy router.

**Important:** Before adding, enable Remote Management in your router settings:
Settings > Advanced Settings > Administration > Remote Management

Use the router's local LAN IP address (typically https://192.168.10.1), NOT the remote/WAN IP which may change after reboots.
user.title: Add new router

data.device_list: Comma separated list of devices (MAC or hostname) for detailed reports

restart_5g_connection.name: Restart 5G connection
restart_5g_connection.description: Restarts the 5G modem connection by triggering a modem reset.

switch_5g_band.name: Switch 5G band
switch_5g_band.description: Changes the 5G band setting on the router.

band.name: Band
band.description: The 5G band value to switch to (e.g., 'auto', 'n78', 'n41').

send_sms.name: Send SMS
send_sms.description: Sends an SMS message via the router's cellular modem.

message.name: Message
message.description: The SMS message content (max ~70 characters for single SMS).

send_at_command.name: Send AT command
send_at_command.description: Sends a raw AT command to the router's cellular modem.
